facts.fact_text: Vietnam’s annual inflation rate slowed to 2.53% in January 2026, the lowest since July 2023, down from 3.48% in December.

evidences.evidence_text: Vietnam’s annual inflation rate slowed to 2.53% in January 2026, the lowest since July 2023, down from 3.48% in December.

facts.fact_text: Inflation eased across most sub-components, particularly food and foodstuff services (3.64% vs 4.20% in December), driven by a decline in food costs (-1.22%).

evidences.evidence_text: Inflation eased across most sub-components, particularly food and foodstuff services (3.64% vs 4.20% in December), driven by a decline in food costs (-1.22%).

facts.fact_text: Deflation deepened for transport (-3.76% vs -0.55%) and information and communication (-0.28% vs -0.25%).

evidences.evidence_text: Deflation deepened for transport (-3.76% vs -0.55%) and information and communication (-0.28% vs -0.25%).

facts.fact_text: On a monthly basis, consumer prices inched up 0.05%, following a 0.19% gain in December.

evidences.evidence_text: On a monthly basis, consumer prices inched up 0.05%, following a 0.19% gain in December.

facts.fact_text: The core inflation rate eased to 3.19% from 3.27% in December.

evidences.evidence_text: The core inflation rate eased to 3.19% from 3.27% in December.

evidence.evidence_text: Vietnam’s annual inflation rate slowed to 2.53% in January 2026, the lowest since July 2023, down from 3.48% in December.
Inflation eased across most sub-components, particularly food and foodstuff services (3.64% vs 4.20% in December), driven by a decline in food costs (-1.22%).
Deflation deepened for transport (-3.76% vs -0.55%) and information and communication (-0.28% vs -0.25%).
Deflation deepened for transport (-3.76% vs -0.55%) and information and communication (-0.28% vs -0.25%).
